tweet: Whether I'm in Oklahoma or DC, I like to keep a full schedule. I took @OUDaily along with me for a busy day of district work a couple weeks ago, check out what we did --> https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=2&v=j6JRlhxXl80 …
3.2% GDP growth after the 1st quarter - there's no denying the power of @realDonaldTrump's pro-growth policies anymore! Let's keep up the work & continue to grow our economy.
He is risen, indeed! pic.twitter.com/czk3LECreR
Let's close the door on this sad chapter in American history & move on to celebrate the success of @realDonaldTrump's policies & leadership across our country.

.@realDonaldTrump was rightfully frustrated & upset that the outset of his administration was constantly under the shadow of this investigation. The outstanding results of his efforts always took a back seat to rumors of collusion & corruption. 

Today, we finally clear the air.

As far as I can tell, @TheDemocrats wanted so badly for collusion to be true, for the downfall of American democracy & the failure of @realDonaldTrump, that they would say & do anything to make it true.

Many of my colleagues (cc: @RepAdamSchiff) have claimed for YEARS that they have substantial evidence against @realDonaldTrump, that they know he colluded w/ Russia.

If a 2 yr investigation & unlimited resources couldn't find it, I invite them to please bring it forward.

AG Barr said it this morning & I repeat it: this was an unprecedented situation. 

@realDonaldTrump had every right & every opportunity to invoke exec. privilege & censor the findings of the investigation. Instead, he fully cooperated & supports full transparency of the report.
We wasted 675 days on this useless investigation, costing the American people more than $30 million.
This morning, Attorney General Barr further confirmed the information we already knew: there was NO collusion between Russia & @realDonaldTrump or his campaign.

Special Counsel Robert Mueller's report is finally public & we can move on from this sad chapter in American history. 

See my full statement here --> https://hern.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=49 …

We're working hard in Congress to make the #TaxCutsAndJobsAct permanent, for Oklahomans to continue keeping MORE of their paychecks, and for businesses to keep investing in their employees and giving back to their communities.

Consumers felt the lift as well, when @PSOklahoma, @ONEGasInc & @OGandE paid it forward in the form of savings for customers. 

The #TaxCutsAndJobsAct continues to deliver!

Happy #TaxDay, Oklahoma! Thanks to the #TaxCutsAndJobsAct, 90% of American workers have higher take-home pay.  Employers of all sizes are hiring, raising wages, increasing benefits, and expanding operations.

In short, these #100DaysOfDems have been a major disappointment to every American. With another 20 months of the @HouseDemocrats majority to go, I can only imagine what disappointments are yet to come.

Ignoring the fiscal cliff our country is standing on, @HouseBudgetDems refuse to draft a budget this year - an unprecedented & petty move to spite @realDonaldTrump. Instead, they put forth - & then pulled - a caps & spending bill that only increases our deficit.
#100DaysOfDems

With several bills, they have taken major steps to infringe on our #2ndAmendment right to bear arms, some even arguing to ban firearms entirely. We cannot take this infringement on our rights lightly.
#100DaysOfDems

At every turn, @HouseDemocrats have ignored the crisis happening at our Southern border & refused to fund border security. Instead, they endorse open, unregulated borders & want taxpayer dollars going to illegal immigrants. 
#100DaysOfDems

Making campaign finance reform their top priority, they failed to put together a bill that addressed the issue & instead violated our #FirstAmendment rights with the ACLU-rejected #HR1.
#100DaysOfDems

With the rising popularity of #socialism, @TheDemocrats have endorsed the radical, unimaginable #GreenNewDeal. HOWEVER, not 1 senator was willing to vote for it - & its creator was upset it went up for a vote at all.
#100DaysOfDems

Enabling #Antisemitism, @SpeakerPelosi refused to condemn the hateful remarks made by @Ilhan (on MULTIPLE occasions), allowing anti-Semitic rhetoric a free pass in the halls of Congress. 
America has always been & will continue to be Israel's strongest friend.
#100DaysOfDems

.@SpeakerPelosi, long revered among Democrats for her iron grip on her caucus, has lost control of the progressive wing of her party, resulting in numerous flubs and embarrassing missteps.
